metadata.title: CVE-2021-36417 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in GPAC v1.0.1 in thegf_isom_dovi_config_get function in MP4Box, which causes a denial ofservice or execute arbitrary code via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
